daily_specials.monday: Buy one pasta, get second half off
daily_specials.tuesday: Kids eat free with adult entrée
daily_specials.thursday: Large pizza for the price of medium
daily_specials.sunday: Family Sunday: Free large salad with 2+ entrées

combo_deals.name: Family Feast
combo_deals.description: 2 large pizzas + 1 pasta + garlic bread + 2L soda

allergen_info.note: Please inform your server of any allergies. Our kitchen handles gluten, dairy, nuts, and shellfish.
allergen_info.gluten_free_options: We offer gluten-free pasta and pizza crust upon request (+$2.00)
allergen_info.vegan_options: Many items can be made vegan. Ask about our vegan cheese option.
